alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead NRA, Colorado River-AZ side (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 12 at 10:52AM MST until June 12 at 8:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT/MST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHERN NEVADA AND NORTHWESTERN ARIZONA... * AFFECTED AREA...In Arizona...Fire weather zone 101. In Nevada...Fire weather zones 460, 461, 462, 463, 464, 465, and 466. * TIMING...This morning through this evening. Widespread gusty winds will develop by early-afternoon, then peak in the mid-to- late afternoon, decreasing through the evening. * WIND...Southwest winds 15 to 25 MPH with gusts 35 to 45 MPH. * HUMIDITY...5 to 10 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead NRA, Colorado River-AZ side
